directions: Cook pasta in boiling water until al dente.  Drain, and rinse in cold water until cool.
In a salad bowl, combine macaroni, lettuce, pears, strawberries, and celery.  Set aside.
In a small bowl, stir together yogurt, orange juice, and poppy seeds. Add to the macaroni mixture, and gently toss until well coated.
ingredients: 2 cups washed, dried and torn butterhead lettuce
title: Fruity Pasta Salad With Lemon Poppy Seed Dressing
